NordVPN Birthday Deals: Get Up to 1 Year Free

As part of its birthday celebration, the VPN company allows new users to reap some fresh discounts. The cheapest one is Basic at $3.39/mo and 70% off.

This deal includes only the VPN but with no free months. However, the situation becomes different with the Plus plan.

The Plus plan is also 70% off but includes Threat Protection Pro for ad-blocking and NordPass at $4.39/mo. NordVPN offers a coupon for 6 free months. This means you’ll pay only $105.36 for 30 months.

Complete and Prime plans at $5.39/mo and $8.39/mo (72% off) are virtually NordVPN’s flagship deals. The former adds NordLocker on top, while the latter also includes NordProtect for added privacy.

The Complete plan also has a 6-month coupon but the Prime bumps it up to a year. As Prime costs $201.36 for 2 years, once you add a year on top, the price dwindles to just about $5.6/mo.

All plans are accessible directly through our buttons and links. Click any of them, select the plan, and follow the steps to subscribe. Now, set up NordVPN on your device, connect, and enjoy security, privacy, streaming, and much more.

We failed to mention the provider’s 30-day money-back guarantee.

NordVPN doubles down on its qualities with these heart-melting discounts. Whichever plan you get, you’ll sing the song of satisfaction all day long. Think of it as a tribute to NordVPN’s 13 years on the market. Happy Birthday!
